welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haddington, a charming town known for its historic landmarks and scenic countryside. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Edinburgh Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select 'EDI Free WiFi' from the list of available networks and follow the instructions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leuchars Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Leuchars Airport is used for military operations and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
